Title: D-Bus: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities in D-Bus might allow an attacker to
    overwrite files with a fixed filename in arbitrary directories or conduct a
    symlink attack.

Background.Text: D-Bus is a message bus system which processes can use to talk to each other.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in D-Bus. Please review the original report referenced below for details.

Impact.Text:
An attacker could possibly overwrite arbitrary files named “once” with content not controlled by the attacker.

A local attacker could perform a symlink attack against D-Bus’ test suite.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All D-Bus users should upgrade to the latest version:
